text: Ezɨ e bizir kabagh nɨghnɨgha zurara ia bagha e uan God ko mɨgei, eghtɨ a ian akurvagham. E kamagh sua, a ia damutɨ arazir aghuir a damuasa ian diaziba, ia dar amuam. E a ko mɨkɨmtɨma, a gavgavim ia danɨngam. Eghtɨ ia, arazir aghuir ia damuasa ifongeziba bar, ia dar amuam. Eghtɨ Godɨn gavgavim ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavim damutɨ, an ekeveghtɨ ia arazir aghuir avɨribar amuam.
